root.name: Snapshot
root.description: OverviewSnapshot is a 2D puzzle-platform that uses the unique mechanic of taking pictures that allows you to manipulate your environment. Playing as a small robot with a, well, camera, you take pictures of various objects in the environment and can teleport them other places in the level. The game is broken into chapters, which are further broken into three levels, each with their own hidden item to take a 'snapshot' of.
